messages.content: What is the purpose of the LiamLoadImage node in the LiamUtil library?
LiamLoadImage allows easy loading of images stored in OSS when working with API interfaces.
Where are images loaded by default in ComfyUI?
ComfyUI defaults to loading the contents of the Input folder.
How can I use LiamLoadImage in a ComfyUI workflow?
Drag the LiamLoadImage node into Comfy UI to load an example workflow.
What type of images can be loaded using the LiamLoadImage node?
The node supports loading images stored in OSS.
